# Data 

## Deaths

```{r}
w_deaths_2015_2021_pop <- 
  read_rds("data/BfS-closed/w_deaths_2015_2021_pop.Rds") %>% 
  mutate(id_time = as.numeric(as.factor(date))) %>% 
  # select(-date) %>% 
  relocate(id_time, .after = month) %>% 
  mutate(id_space = as.integer(as.factor(ARNR))) %>% 
  relocate(id_space, .after = id_time)
```

## Spatial

```{r}
gg21 <- read_rds("data/BfS/gg21.Rds")
tg3o <- read_rds("data/geo/tg3o.Rds")
```

<!-- ----------------------------------------------------- -->

# Preps 

```{r}
w_deaths_2015_2021_pop %<>%
  mutate(population_mid_poi = if_else(deaths > population_mid_poi, deaths, population_mid_poi))
```

<!-- ----------------------------------------------------- -->

# Time series plots

## Aggregated data 

```{r}
data <- w_deaths_2015_2021_pop %>% 
  mutate(rate = 1000 * deaths / population) %>% 
  group_by(GMDNAME, date) %>% 
  summarize(deaths = sum(deaths),
            CDR = weighted.mean(rate, population),
            population = sum(population)
  ) %>% 
  ungroup() 
```

## Deaths

```{r echo=FALSE}
ggplot(data, aes(x = date, y = deaths, group = GMDNAME)) + 
  geom_line(colour = "darkorchid", alpha = 0.25) +
  theme_minimal() + 
  ylab("Number of deaths") + xlab("")
```

## Crude mort rates

```{r echo=FALSE}
ggplot(data, aes(x = date, y = CDR, group = GMDNAME)) + 
  geom_line(colour = "darkorchid", alpha = 0.25) +
  theme_minimal() + 
  ylab("Crude death rate [per 10,000]") + xlab("")
```

# Simple modelling

## Data

```{r}
model_data <- w_deaths_2015_2021_pop %>% 
  mutate(id_year = year - 2014,
         observed = deaths) %>% 
  relocate(observed, .before = deaths) %>% 
  relocate(id_year, .before = year) %>% 
  mutate(deaths = if_else(year >= 2020, NA_integer_, observed)) %>% 
  filter(age == "80+" & sex == "Male") %>% 
  select(-age, - sex)

# sapply(model_data, function(x) sum(is.na(x)))
```

## INLA setup

```{r}
# priors
hyper.iid <- list(theta = list(prior = "pc.prec", param = c(1, 0.01)))
hyper.bym <- list(theta1 = list("PCprior", c(1, 0.01)), 
                  theta2 = list("PCprior", c(0.5, 0.5)))

# Under Poisson uses default set up
control.family <- inla.set.control.family.default()
```

## Base spatial

```{r}
f1 <-
  deaths ~ 1 + offset(log(population_mid_poi)) + 
  f(id_time, model = "rw2", hyper = hyper.iid, constr = TRUE, scale.model = TRUE) +
  f(id_year, model = "iid", hyper = hyper.iid, constr = TRUE) +
  f(month, model = "seasonal", hyper = hyper.iid, constr = TRUE, scale.model = TRUE, season.length = 12) +
  # f(month, model = "rw1", hyper = hyper.iid, constr = TRUE, scale.model = TRUE, cyclic = TRUE) +
  f(id_space, model = "bym2", 
    graph = "data/nb/gg21_wm_q.adj", 
    # graph = "data/nb/tg3o_wm_q.adj", 
    scale.model = TRUE, constr = TRUE, hyper = hyper.bym)

m1 <- inla(f1,
           data = model_data,
           # family = "zeroinflatedpoisson0",
           # family = "zeroinflatedpoisson1",
           family = "zeroinflatednbinomial0",
           # family = "zeroinflatednbinomial1",
           # verbose = TRUE,
           control.family = control.family,
           control.compute = list(config = TRUE, 
                                  return.marginals.predictor = TRUE,
                                  # cpo = TRUE,
                                  dic = TRUE, waic = TRUE),
           control.mode = list(restart = TRUE),
           num.threads = round(parallel::detectCores() * .8),
           control.predictor = list(compute = TRUE, link = 1)
           # , control.inla = list(int.strategy = "grid", diff.logdens = 4)
           # , control.inla = list(strategy = "laplace", npoints = 21)
)

summary(m1)
m1$summary.hyperpar

m1_time <- m1$summary.random$id_time %>% 
  mutate(`0.025quant` = exp(`0.025quant`),
         `0.5quant` = exp(`0.5quant`),
         `0.975quant` = exp(`0.975quant`))

m1_time %>% 
  filter(ID <= 60) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = ID)) + 
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = `0.025quant`, ymax = `0.975quant`), alpha = 0.1) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = `0.5quant`)) + 
  theme_minimal()

m1_month <- m1$summary.random$month %>% 
  mutate(`0.025quant` = exp(`0.025quant`),
         `0.5quant` = exp(`0.5quant`),
         `0.975quant` = exp(`0.975quant`))

m1_month %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = ID)) + 
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = `0.025quant`, ymax = `0.975quant`), alpha = 0.1) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = `0.5quant`)) + 
  theme_minimal()

m1_year <- m1$summary.random$id_year %>% 
  mutate(ID = ID + 2014, 
         `0.025quant` = exp(`0.025quant`),
         `0.5quant` = exp(`0.5quant`),
         `0.975quant` = exp(`0.975quant`))

m1_year %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = ID)) + 
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = `0.025quant`, ymax = `0.975quant`), alpha = 0.1) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = `0.5quant`)) + 
  theme_minimal()

m1_fit <- bind_cols(
  model_data,
  m1$summary.fitted.values
) %>% 
  mutate(split = ifelse(id_time <= 60, "Pre", "Pand"))

ggplot(m1_fit) + 
  geom_point(aes(x = `0.5quant`, y = observed), alpha = 0.22) + 
  facet_wrap(vars(split)) +
  theme_minimal()

m1_fit %>% 
  filter(GMDNAME == "Lugano") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date)) + 
  # geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = `0.025quant`, ymax = `0.975quant`), alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `0.5quant`)) + 
  geom_point(aes(y = observed), alpha = 0.22) + 
  # facet_wrap(vars(split), scales = "free_x") +
  theme_minimal()

m1_space <-
  # ar21 %>%
  tg3o_ar %>%
  left_join(model_data %>% select(ARNR, id_space) %>% distinct()) %>%
  left_join(m1$summary.random$id_space %>%
              slice(1:nrow(ar21)) %>% 
              mutate(`0.025quant` = exp(`0.025quant`),
                     `0.5quant` = exp(`0.5quant`),
                     `0.975quant` = exp(`0.975quant`)),
            by = c("id_space" = "ID")) %>%
  mutate(`0.5quant` = exp(`0.5quant`))

tm_shape(m1_space) +
  tm_fill("0.5quant")
```
